theoryText: Some fans theorize that Sanji's ability to use Diable Jambe without harming himself is connected to Lunarian heritage. Lunarians are a race with natural fire abilities and enhanced durability when their flames are active. This theory suggests that Sanji's genetic modifications from the Vinsmoke family may have awakened latent Lunarian traits, explaining his resistance to his own flames.
author: Various One Piece fans
evidenceFor: Sanji can generate and withstand intense flames
Vinsmoke genetic modifications could have activated dormant traits
evidenceAgainst: Oda stated in SBS that Sanji's 'heart burns hotter' than his flames
No confirmed Lunarian connection to Vinsmoke family
Diable Jambe explained as friction-based technique

theoryText: The official explanation from Oda is that Sanji generates Diable Jambe by spinning at high speed to create friction that ignites his leg. When asked why Sanji doesn't burn himself, Oda humorously explained that 'Sanji's heart burns hotter than his flames.' This suggests the technique is powered by Sanji's burning passion and determination rather than any supernatural ability.
author: Eiichiro Oda (SBS)
evidenceFor: Stated by series creator Eiichiro Oda
Consistent with Sanji's character as passionate and hot-blooded
Animation shows spinning motion before ignition

theoryText: Some fans theorized early on that Diable Jambe was an unconscious manifestation of Armament Haki before Haki was formally introduced in the series. This theory suggested that Sanji was coating his leg in invisible Haki that generated heat through intense willpower. However, this was later disproven when Sanji learned actual Haki techniques post-timeskip.
author: Various One Piece fans
evidenceFor: Heat generation could be explained by Haki
Other characters later show Haki can generate effects
evidenceAgainst: Sanji didn't know Haki at this point in the story
Diable Jambe and Haki are shown as separate abilities later

theoryText: Fans have theorized about where and how Sanji developed Diable Jambe. Some believe he may have trained in extreme conditions or faced situations that pushed him to develop this technique. The exact circumstances of its development remain mysterious, as Sanji revealed it without explanation during the Jabra fight.
author: Various One Piece fans
evidenceFor: Sanji used it without any prior hints or foreshadowing
Technique appears fully developed on first use
evidenceAgainst: No canon explanation of when or where he developed it
Sanji may have developed it spontaneously during battle
